nodes.bodyText: I believe these couple constants need to be non-private (probably package private), right? It will be used by the one who submit this job to RuntimeManager.
we will need some of them, I will modify accessibility of these variables to reuse them while opening RuntimeJobManager implementation PR..

Better to have a createCConf method.
CConfiguration cConf = createCConf(runtimeJobEnv);
Seems like it's better to move this logic into the parent method.
Seems like you don't need to catch and rethrow since the run method is already having throws Exception?
